title: Project Planning and Requirements Gathering
description: Define the project scope, goals, and requirements. Conduct user research and gather feedback from potential users and stakeholders.

title: System Architecture Design
description: Design the overall system architecture, including the VR environment, simulation engine, user interface components, and data management. Consider scalability, performance, security, and maintainability aspects. Propose a modular design to facilitate future updates and improvements. Include details on the choice of technologies for each component and their interoperability. Provide a clear roadmap for development, testing, and deployment stages.

title: VR Environment Development
description: Develop the VR environment, including 3D models, textures, and interactions.

title: Simulation Engine Development
description: Develop the simulation engine that handles the different leadership styles and scenario logic.

title: User Interface Development
description: Develop the user interface for configuring simulations, selecting leadership styles, and viewing results.

title: Database Design and Implementation
description: Design and implement the database schema for storing simulation data, user profiles, leadership styles, scenarios, and other relevant information. Consider scalability, performance, and data integrity requirements. Ensure proper indexing and normalization techniques are applied. Define data access patterns and implement necessary APIs or services for data retrieval and manipulation. Incorporate appropriate security measures to protect sensitive user data and ensure compliance with relevant data privacy regulations. Additionally, consider integrating the database design with existing system architecture, and provide documentation on database schema design, implementation, and usage. Once completed, conduct unit testing and integration testing before pushing to production.

title: Security and Access Control
description: Implement robust security measures including user authentication, authorization, and data encryption to ensure the application's security. Consider implementing role-based access control (RBAC) for fine-grained permissions, auditing mechanisms, and secure user management. Implement multi-factor authentication for added security.

title: Integration and Testing
description: Integrate the various components and perform comprehensive testing, including unit tests, integration tests, and user acceptance testing.

title: Deployment and DevOps
description: Set up the deployment pipeline, configure the production environment, and automate the deployment process.

title: Documentation and User Guides
description: Create comprehensive documentation, including user guides, technical documentation, and training materials.
